sentence: when we were done we went down to the lobby again and sat down the same reception guy saw me again and asked if we were taken up to the pool that was a follow up
The crazy thing is if you are not a guest and simple sit in the lobby you are provided with a free internet password

From the numerous pointless intrusions lack of pick up of laundry service for 5 hours after 3 requests failure to clean more like placement of a hairball in my sink no replacement of amenities etc etc

electric shutters with just view of office building beside but to be expected in CBD I guess I m sure other rooms with a better view maybe worth asking for Had an issue with my room card not swiping and did nt have ID on me when at reception to get it working so was escorted to my room as a security measure which was good
Breakfast was almost the same as Buffet downstairs
Reception staff were always on hand to help with more than a couple of minutes delay in getting served
Just did not have enough time to check out the pool and gym
I do think that you should give a guest the option of a disabled room as the facilities are not the same

Holding the plate can not find the food you want to eat 5 there is no chef in the field cut the kind of ham only baked and baked black coke that kind of bacon 6 the bathtub is relatively small bath the boss may save water bar 7 we live in a large bed room towels only 2 usually five star hotel is equipped with four bath towel ❗ 8 want to go to the gym the results of four elevators inside three elevators can not directly reach the gym the key is inside the elevator there is no one tips three elevators can not directly reach the gym it is estimated that the boss to save development costs or Do not want the guests to use the gym at all 9 Wi Fi charges the lobby of the public areas are also charged the room will have to charge this boss is more love money ah ❗ 10 the parking lot to be charged
early check in has never been possible and the hotel does not seem to have enhanced amenities

The location is ideal and the facilities are incredible and the staff particularly the Sheraton Club Team Lachie Nina and Kelly were always so helpful friendly and respectful and made my stay far more welcoming and comfortable
Beautiful room and facilities
Amazing four day trip with brilliant accommodation and befet breakie
Love the pool and spa facilities
The room was nicely appointed and very clean with good amenities
Room are spacious with modern facilities
The entrance of the hotel is very luxurious and very welcoming
Hotel has very good facilities very reasonably priced too
The staff from downstairs meeting you at your car to checkin are there to help with a smile
On the roof there is a well equipped leisure area which includes a Gym Sauna and swimming pool
